description: All your team communication in one place, instantly searchable, available wherever you go.
releaseNotes:
- Autocorrect wasn't disabled during autocomplete if user had predictive text turned off
- Various layout fixes for our iPad users (with many more improvements still to come) 
- Fixed: A broken search on the 'Invite others to channel' screen was making it hard to do that
- Fixed: Cursory cursor issue when editing file titles
- Fixed: It's now possible to view whatever video or audio file you desire directly from search
- Fixed: Part of the file name was missing from the details view if the file name was more than about 22 characters
- Fixed: We've fixed the loophole in the last release that allowed Gif to be pronouced "Jif". As you were.
- Fixed: 3rd party keyboards broke the file upload screen
- Fixed: When the keyboard was dismissed by swiping down, the chat window would then partially scroll back up, which was interesting, but not in a good way
- Fixed: Tapping the text input field while in any channel or private group while the keyboard was minimized caused the keyboard to then overlap the text input
- Fixed: Rejiggered the file list view navigation bar that overlapped "Everyone" or "Just You" labels
- Fixed: The cool but unhelpful fake name (null).slack.com was displayed while joining a new team via the sign in flow. It isn't any more
- Fixed: Brought back the missing back arrow from the flexpane file view on iOS 7
- Fixed: On iPads running iOS 8, the text input that would bounce after sending a message has been told very firmly to chill out
- Fixed: @everyone in a non-general channel would show the correct dialog but didn't post the message to #general as expected
- Fixed: Embarrassing typo in Skype username placeholder text has now been corrected
- Fixed: @autocomplete now works properly with VoiceOver. Which speaks for itself.
